name: Terry Skies
description:
Use "A" & "D" keys to move left and right. 

"W" to jump. 

And "L" to fire. 

Note: You can't use the fruits to heal, I haven't figured it out yet. 

Try defeating the armored knight!

Note: It's still a working progress. There is no pause nor end game for it yet. I'm still learning. Hopefully its still fun for y'all. 

I'll add the links to the assets used in the game on a later date.
